item.title: Ubuntu 18.04 tips
item.description: Configure Static IP Addresses on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS Server /etc/netplan/*.yaml network: version: 2 renderer: networkd ethernets: eno1: addresses: - 192.168.0.207/24 gateway4: 192.168.0.1 nameservers: addresses: [168.126.63.1,8.8.8.8]

item.title: Bash tips
item.description: Get current directory DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )" How to count number of files in each directory du -a | cut -d/ -f2 | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr
